decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | The proposed window shall not exceed 180 cm wide and 120 cm high.  The sill of the window shall be at the same height as the adjoining window over the internal staircase and a red brick segmental arch shall be created above the new window opening to match the arch above the adjoining window.  REASON:  To protect the appearance of the area.
description: Alterations to rear elevation of first floor maisonette to provide kitchen window
